name: stock_v2_get_financial_details
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool ms_finance.
Tool description: This API helps to query financial summary, stocks, quotes, movers, news, etc... to create a site/application such as morningstar.com
API description: Retrieves financial details for a given stock using the Morningstar API.

performanceid.description: The performance ID value obtained from the /auto-complete, /get-summary, or /get-movers endpoints.

datatype.description: The data frequency. One of the following: 'A' for Annual or 'Q' for Quarterly. Defaults to 'A'.

reporttype.description: The report type. One of the following: 'R' for Restated or 'A' for As originally reported. Defaults to 'A'.

type.description: The data frequency. One of the following: 'A' for Annual or 'Q' for Quarterly. Defaults to 'A'.
